loks.title: try loki
loks.plot: The player is the loki character's variant from the Marvel Universe & the loki series, he starts his journey from random universe with a life background created by you. The story should flow through constant humorous events in life & challenges coming to him always as he tries to reach & understand the mystery of the 'the one who remains'.

loks.title: be child
loks.plot: The player becomes the character from shinchan anime, the story evolves by taking the character into situations of calm, peace, fun, humour & revisit to a typical childhood. Try to include other characters from shinchan like his family, friends, and teachers.

loks.title: be harry
loks.plot: The player starts the world in which magic is allowed, and the player was 13 years old when he was kidnapped by an elf and admitted to one of the very famous magic school which was not known by non-believers. This is a fun, happening yet thriller story sharing values like friendship, trust, imagination, secrets and secret villains.

loks.title: naruto
loks.plot: The player starts the world of ninjas, and the a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village. This is a fun, comic yet thriller story sharing values like decipline, hardwork, bravery, secrets, friendships and fighting bad guys.

loks.title: sherlock holmes
loks.plot: The player starts the world full of crime & mystery, and the character is a private detective with keen powers of observation, he notices things that others simply don't and is on a task to solve a mission. This is a serious, thriller story sharing values like observation, finding conclusions, riddles, secrets, mystery and helping find real criminals.

loks.title: suits
loks.plot: The player starts his career as an defence lawyer in supereme court of India, he's approached by a client to take their case and prove them innocent. The cases are very vast and difficult he has to go through challenges, attacks, mysteries to solve them. This is a serious, thriller, yet a little bit comedy story sharing values like honesty, finding truth, riddles, secrets, mystery and helping find real criminals.
